code: var token=localStorage.getItem('token');var id=localStorage.getItem('userId');export var loadUsers=function loadUsers(){return fetch('api/v1/auth/users',{method:'GET',headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(response){return response.json();});};export var loadUser=function loadUser(){return fetch("api/v1/auth/users/".concat(id),{method:'GET',headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(response){return response.json();});};export var verifyUser=function verifyUser(){return fetch("api/v1/auth/users/".concat(localStorage.getItem('email'),"/verify"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('verificationToken')),'Content-Type':'application/json'}}).then(function(response){return response.json();});};export var signup=function signup(user){return fetch('api/v1/auth/signup',{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify(user),headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}}).then(function(response){return response.json();});};export var signin=function signin(user){return fetch('api/v1/auth/signin',{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify(user),headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}}).then(function(response){return response.json();});};
